com.defano.jmonet.canvas

Interface PaintCanvas

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable, GridSurface, LayeredImage, ObservableSurface, PaintSurface, ScalableSurface, ScaledLayeredImage, ScanlineSurface, ScrollableSurface, SwingSurface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPaintCanvas, JMonetCanvas

    public interface PaintCanvas
extends PaintSurface, ScaledLayeredImage
    A canvas that can be drawn upon by the paint tools.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCanvasCommitObserver(CanvasCommitObserver observer)
      Adds an observer to be notified of scratch buffer commits.
      void clearCanvas()
      Clears the canvas by filling the remove-scratch buffer and committing the change.
      void commit()
      Commits the contents of the scratch buffer to the canvas, using the AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER composite mode.
      void commit(ImageLayerSet imageLayerSet)
      Commits the given ImageLayerSet to the canvas.
      Paint getCanvasBackground()
      Gets the background color of the canvas, that is, the Paint which is displayed behind transparent pixels in the painted image.
      BufferedImage getCanvasImage()
      Gets the image that has been painted on this canvas, not including any ephemeral changes that have been made via the scratch buffer but have not been committed to the canvas.
      Dimension getCanvasSize()
      Gets the (un-scaled) dimensions of the canvas (that is, the size of the image which can be painted).
      Scratch getScratch()
      Gets the Scratch buffer associated with this canvas.
      boolean removeCanvasCommitObserver(CanvasCommitObserver observer)
      Removes an existing observer.
      void setCanvasBackground(Paint paint)
      Specifies the canvas background paint, that is, the color or pattern displayed behind transparent pixels in the painted image (like a checkerboard pattern or a solid color).
      void setCanvasSize(Dimension surfaceDimensions)
      Specifies the (un-scaled) size of this painting surface.

        getCursor, getSurfaceDimension, isVisible, repaint, setCursor, setSurfaceDimension, setVisible

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.canvas.surface.ScanlineSurface

        getScanlineColor, getScanlineComposite, getScanlineScaleThreadhold, paintScanlines, setScanlineColor, setScanlineComposite, setScanlineScaleThreadhold

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.canvas.surface.ScalableSurface

        convertModelPointToView, convertViewPointToModel, getScale, getScaleObservable, scaleDimension, scalePoint, scaleRectangle, setScale

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.canvas.surface.GridSurface

        getGridSpacingObservable, setGridSpacing

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.canvas.surface.SwingSurface

        addComponent, removeComponent

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.canvas.observable.ObservableSurface

        addSurfaceInteractionObserver, removeSurfaceInteractionObserver

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.canvas.surface.ScrollableSurface

        getScrollError, getSurfaceScrollController, setSurfaceScrollController

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.canvas.surface.Disposable

        dispose

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.canvas.layer.ScaledLayeredImage

        getScale

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.canvas.layer.LayeredImage

        getImageLayers, getSize, paint, render

    • Method Detail

      • commit

        void commit()
        Commits the contents of the scratch buffer to the canvas, using the AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER composite mode.

      • commit

        void commit(ImageLayerSet imageLayerSet)
        Commits the given ImageLayerSet to the canvas.
        Parameters:
        imageLayerSet - The ImageLayerSet to be committed.

      • clearCanvas

        void clearCanvas()
        Clears the canvas by filling the remove-scratch buffer and committing the change.

      • getScratch

        Scratch getScratch()
        Gets the Scratch buffer associated with this canvas. The scratch buffer provides a mechanism for tools to draw ephemeral changes (like marching ants, text tool caret, etc.) to the canvas without actually modifying the underlying image.
        Returns:
        The scratch buffer.

      • getCanvasImage

        BufferedImage getCanvasImage()
        Gets the image that has been painted on this canvas, not including any ephemeral changes that have been made via the scratch buffer but have not been committed to the canvas.
        Returns:
        The canvas image.

      • getCanvasSize

        Dimension getCanvasSize()
        Gets the (un-scaled) dimensions of the canvas (that is, the size of the image which can be painted). This dimension is unrelated to the size of the Swing component that displays/encapsulates it.
        Returns:
        The un-scaled dimensions of this surface.

      • setCanvasSize

        void setCanvasSize(Dimension surfaceDimensions)
        Specifies the (un-scaled) size of this painting surface. This determines the size of the image that can be painted, but is unrelated to the size of Swing component that displays/encapsulates it.
        Parameters:
        surfaceDimensions - The dimensions of the painting surface

      • getCanvasBackground

        Paint getCanvasBackground()
        Gets the background color of the canvas, that is, the Paint which is displayed behind transparent pixels in the painted image.
        Returns:
        The canvas background.

      • setCanvasBackground

        void setCanvasBackground(Paint paint)
        Specifies the canvas background paint, that is, the color or pattern displayed behind transparent pixels in the painted image (like a checkerboard pattern or a solid color).
        Parameters:
        paint - The canvas background

      • addCanvasCommitObserver

        void addCanvasCommitObserver(CanvasCommitObserver observer)
        Adds an observer to be notified of scratch buffer commits.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer to be registered.

      • removeCanvasCommitObserver

        boolean removeCanvasCommitObserver(CanvasCommitObserver observer)
        Removes an existing observer.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer to be removed.
        Returns:
        True if the given observer was successfully unregistered; false otherwise.
